item.title: Start_Jenkins
item.description: Introduction 1 2 s = "Python syntax highlighting" print s Why Jenkins Jenkins is a very useful tool to make the process automatic

item.title: Add Search to Hugo
item.description: Search I use the commercial search function, which is easy to make it realized. Add search function is very useful, beacuse user in the internet has develop the habit of searching in the website. And it is also a good way to attract user stay on the website for long time. 1 print "hello"

item.title: KBEngine and Unity
item.description: KBEngine This is a server engine. The most import concept is that each player is seen as a entity. The entity is splict into three parts: client, cell and base. The data could be transferred between these three part. It is obvious to assume Unity Unity is a client engine. It will create scene and UI for game. We put the connection logic between players into KBEngine.

item.title: Build homepage with Hugo and Github
item.description: Why Homepage? I have build website lots of times, but I did’t insist on it.

item.title: Git Usage
item.description: SourceTree SourceTree is a very good tool. It provides an interface for diff and merge in git. It is also eazy to show the branch in the game. Basic command I have to understand the basic command so that when we click the button, we could know what happend behand it.
